scripts.start:mobile: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PREFIX=/runtime-mobile SERVER_ENV=prod node bin/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.start:mobile:snow: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PREFIX=/runtime-mobile SERVER_ENV=snow node bin/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.start:mobile:pre: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PREFIX=/runtime-mobile SERVER_ENV=pre node bin/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.start:mobile:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PREFIX=/runtime-mobile SERVER_ENV=production node bin/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.start:mobile:yonbip: cross-env NODE_ENV=production CACHE_META=false PREFIX=/runtime-mobile SERVER_ENV=yonbip node bin/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.start:mobile:sandbox: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PREFIX=/runtime-mobile SERVER_ENV=sandbox node bin/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.debug:mobile:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=daily MDF_LANG=false MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack-dev-server --progress --profile --colors  --config webpack.config.js
scripts.debug:mobile:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=development PREFIX=/ MDF_TARGET=mobile MDF_LANG=false  nodemon -w src/mobile/server -w src/mobile/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.client:pre: cross-env BABEL_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=pre MDF_LANG=false MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack-dev-server --progress --profile --colors  --config webpack.config.js
scripts.server:pre: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=pre NODE_ENV=development MDF_TARGET=mobile MDF_LANG=false  nodemon -w src/mobile/server -w src/mobile/common --exec babel-node --only=src,node_modules/@mdf --inspect src/mobile/server/index.js
scripts.build:dll: npm run build:dll:dev && npm run build:dll:prod
scripts.build:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production babel src -d bin --ignore client && echo '后端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=daily MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production SERVER_ENV=daily MDF_TARGET=mobile babel src -d bin --ignore src/web/client,src/business && echo '后端程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:client:pre: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false SERVER_ENV=pre NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:client:snow: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false SERVER_ENV=snow NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:client:production: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false SERVER_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:client:yonbip: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false SERVER_ENV=yonbip NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:client:2020: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false SERVER_ENV=2020 NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.build:mobile:client:sandbox: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production MDF_LANG=false SERVER_ENV=sandbox NODE_ENV=production MDF_TARGET=mobile webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '移动程序：编译完成'
scripts.package: cross-env BABEL_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --colors --progress && echo '前端程序：打包完成'
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:mobile: npm run build:mobile:client && npm run build:mobile:server
scripts.build:mobile:pre: npm run build:mobile:client:pre && npm run build:mobile:server
scripts.build:mobile:snow: npm run build:mobile:client:snow && npm run build:mobile:server
scripts.build:mobile:production: npm run build:mobile:client:production && npm run build:mobile:server
scripts.build:mobile:yonbip: npm run build:mobile:client:yonbip && npm run build:mobile:server
scripts.build:mobile:2020: npm run build:mobile:client:2020 && npm run build:mobile:server
scripts.build:mobile:sandbox: npm run build:mobile:client:sandbox && npm run build:mobile:server
